resources.string: All hacks must be submitted via ChallengePost at www.challengepost.com/hackingedu by 9:30am on Sunday in order to be eligible for prizes.
Who can help me with coding?
Anyone with a HackingEDU Staff shirt can connect you with a sponsor or experienced team member depending on the language or framework
Can someone help me with Git?
Look for Vivek Vinodh, the tall, dark, and handsome Indian guy. He is the Git master. He should be sleeping in the stands right now.
No I meant how to Git ladies?

Oh! You\'ll have to talk to that handsome and sexy Indian male who goes by the name of Ro. He is the guy wearing the stylish snapback and skinny jeans. If he\'s not coding at the moment, he\'s probably gitting all of the ladies. ;)
Click here to submit a help form to HackingEDU Staff.
